title: Device Night Philadelphia: Hands-on with the Elite Controller and the new Xbox One dashboard
text:
Device Night Philadelphia: Hands-on with the Elite Controller and the new Xbox One dashboard 
Published By: Neowin.net - Today 
There was a lot of excitement for the new dashboard and features coming for the Xbox One. We get a guided tour along with an unboxing of the...
